page.title: 05ANTIQUES
page.content: ANTIQUE DEALER { {ING HEY Close by the embankment of Swinden Reservoir is a collection of farm buildings and out-houses owned by Mr. H. Sutcliffe one of the areas leading antique dealers.At one time a number of people worked here packing antiques, including stained glass windows, to send to all corners of the globe, but now this job is done in more substantial premises in Harle Syke. Ing Hey covers 16 acres and Mr. Sutcliffe and his wife have lived here since 1928. As with most of the inhabitants of our area, they love the scenery and the peace and quiet.
